§2Wrought Iron§f is an very durable tool material early on, it has the double durability of §2Iron§f and is very easy to make.

§k§l§fIt's made by putting§2 Iron Nuggets§f in an §2Furnace§  and combining the §foutcoming §2Wrought Iron Nuggets§f into an §2Wrought Iron Ingot§f.
